Include metadata generation with UV coordinates for each sprite. Support configurable padding and max dimensions.
notes:
Completed spritesheet packer tool:
- Reads sprites from sprite-atlas.json
- Loads individual PNG files from assets/sprites/
- Packs using shelf-packing algorithm (sorts by height for efficiency)
- Generates sprite-atlas.png with configurable padding (default 2px)
- Outputs to power-of-two dimensions (max 2048x2048)
- Updates sprite-atlas.json with UV coordinates (pixel + normalized)
- Shows efficiency stats and packing summary
- Added npm script: npm run pack-sprites
- Added canvas dependency to package.json

notes:
Completed UV coordinate rendering support:
- Sprite renderer already had full UV support (u0,v0,u1,v1)
- Added applySpriteUVs() method to texture-manager.js
